title: LaserTasers: The cops abuse them, now you can too!
content:
[url=http://www.taser.com/documents/050725%20X26C%20Sales%20Clarification.pdf]www.taser.com/documents/0...cation.pdf[/url]
[url=http://phx.corporate-ir.net/phoenix.zhtml?c=129937&p=irol-news]phx.corporate-ir.net/phoe...=irol-news[/url]

Basically, what's happening is that this taser company which makes tasers for cops wants to release tasers to the general public!!!

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-offended.gif[/img] It's shock-zing!!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-offended.gif[/img]

Of course, you may not have heard about the guy who was shackled to a chair, had 6 police offisores on him and he was tasered for more than 30 seconds close up. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-bloody.gif[/img]

But don't let that stop you from buying your own taser!!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]

Oh, all right. Maybe the six year old kids shouldn't be shocked by the cops. What do you think? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img] [center][img]http://members.cox.net/aborlan/sig/signature2.gif[/img]
[/center]

content: Where's "Fucl NO!! No tasers here, please!"? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img] I'd vote that.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: LaserTasers: The cops abuse them, now you can too!
Re: LaserTasers: The cops abuse them, now you can too!
content:
Well, in 199 a paris woman entered a greengrocers approached another woman and sprayed her with pepper spray, not even stopping when the shopkeeper tried to seperate them Apparently the woman wanted to 'see if it worked' and even after arest was dissapointed that the attacked woman was still able to fight back with her legs. She ordered a refund.

People are scum and taser won't change that. You can make your own taser pretty easy, and it has been done [and used.]A proud member of the signature stealing society

-Levellord

title: Re: LaserTasers: The cops abuse them, now you can too!
content:
Well the question is, is the possible crime prevention worth the possible deaths and injuries? Many would say that even one death would be unacceptable, but how many lives would be saved in small ways if these guns were brought into use? We don't live in an ideal world, every day we must balance the suffering of some against the happiness of others.A proud member of the signature stealing society

title: I wanr one:
content:
Boy I'd sure like one (as long as only I got one; and no one else)

Najawa: "Mr. Teacher; give us recess, or I will electrify you with my taser!!!"

MR. Teacher: "Um... er... Class Dismissed!!!"

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: I wanr one:
content:
*Najawa turns to leave*

Mr Teacher: Aha! Eat rubber bullets Taser-boy!

*shoots*

Yeah, tasers could be better, fortuneatly that is why there is ongoing research into nonlethal wepons.A proud member of the signature stealing society

title: *3 hours later*
content:
Nurse: who's this punk.

Doc: Some kid with rubber poisoning.


Yeah... I was just joking.

I think they should only be used when a police officer must choose between his gun, or his taser. I think shooting someone takes them out of the misery they'd have in prison. Plus... what If the gun missed; I'd be more than happy to get a full blown taser, rather than a quick, easy death.

-- NAJAWA --
